column5: Does Sail have a spring fishing sale?
We had a sale that ended just a couple days ago, if I had to guess I'd say we'll get another in a month or so.
They usually do, and its usually 15% off everything they do that sale pretty frequently you can sign up for email subscription to all info from them
was there on Saturday. it was 15% off fishing stuff
Yep, bought 900 yards of Power Pro- good price for the bigger spools ( 3 x 300) and no tax.
You should also check out Trombleys  in Orillia they usually have a sale every spring.
I wanna stock up on stuff when they have the 20% off sale.  btw do they offer a better discount higher then 20%?
I wanna stock up on stuff when they have the 20% off sale.  btw do they offer a better discount higher then 20%? No.
